content: --चंद्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} crescent-shaped. (--द्रः {1} the half moon, crescent moon; सार्धचंद्रं बिभर्ति यः <ls>Ku. 6. 75.</ls> {2} the semicircular marks on a peacock's tail. {3} an arrow with a crescent-shaped head; अर्धचंद्रमुखैर्बाणैश्चिच्छेद कदलीसुखम् <ls>R. 12. 96.</ls> {4} a crescent-shaped nail-print. {5} the hand bent into a semicircle, as for the purpose of seizing or clutching anything; °द्रं दा to seize by the neck and turn out; दीयतामेतस्यार्धचंद्रः <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> (--द्रा <ab>N.</ab> of a plant (कर्णस्फोट).
